name: Christopher BERRY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Berry v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Christopher BERRY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of November, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
30 A.3d 1111
Christopher BERRY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 84 EM 2011.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 2, 2011.
